resume.hardSkills: Over 4 years of experience in developing websites, APIs, services, and scripts, with the most widely used technologies in the market, including React, Golang, and NodeJS. I stand out for my excellent communication skills and quick learning ability, always striving to innovate and optimize solutions.
resume.softSkills: Experience with production applications handling high request volumes and data consumption, as well as direct client interaction.

development.title: Development
development.content: Throughout my career in development, I have encountered various types of challenges and projects. From web scraping to log management, I have worked with a wide range of languages and frameworks, such as React, Golang, Python, NodeJS, NextJS, and others. For data management, I am knowledgeable in both relational and non-relational databases, including MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis for caching data.

design.title: Design
design.content: Due to my previous experience as a designer, reproducing pixel-perfect interfaces is one of my greatest strengths as a front-end developer. As a developer, I understand that my clients may not come from a technical background, so I strive to convey professionalism through the visual representation.

communication.title: Communication
communication.content: One of my greatest learnings in my career has been communication. Whether it's speaking with other developers, presenting what the team has accomplished, or negotiating project delivery estimates, communication is key to a good work environment.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.content: If you have any questions or would like to know more about my work, feel free to contact me through the form below or by email. I will be happy to help you!

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.content: Here are some of the technologies I have experience with and can help you implement in your project.
